overview: Sheida is a housewife. Today she brought a fortuneteller, “Afsoon” to her house, while fortunetelling her husband calls and says he would be home soon. Khosro, her boyfriend, arrives and Sheida forces to hide Afsoon. While Sheida is begging Khosro to leave, another guest arrives, she has to hide them all then her husband arrives and realizes something is wrong in the house.
title: No Exit
